Name: Sunny Disposition cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
15 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Slightly on the bitter side of bittersweet with gentian, jammy apricot and lemon juice over a tequila base.
Nutrition: One serving of Sunny Disposition cocktail contains 209 calories
